official-title.#text:
Expressing support for designation of July
		  as National Sarcoma Awareness Month.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Oversight and Government
			 Reform

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: supports the designation of National Sarcoma Awareness Month.

text.#text:
Whereas 1 percent of the cancers diagnosed in adults and
			 15 percent of cancers diagnosed in children each year are sarcoma;

Whereas more than 50 subtypes of sarcomas have been
			 identified;

Whereas the National Cancer Institute recognizes that
			 sarcoma is often misdiagnosed and underreported; and

Whereas July would be an appropriate month to designate as
			 National Sarcoma Awareness Month to raise awareness of the disease and
			 encourage more individuals to get properly diagnosed and treated: Now,
			 therefore, be it
